H0.text: Water is necessary for life on Earth.

H1.text: Trees are necessary for life on Earth.

H2.text: Wind is necessary for life on Earth.

H3.text: Soil is necessary for life on Earth.

A4.text: All known forms of life depend on water.

A5.text: Water is vital both as a solvent in which many of the body's solutes dissolve and as an essential part of many metabolic processes within the body.
